subSections.title: Kanji
Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=なん<なん<なむ
|kanon=だん<だん<だむ
|kanyoon=な
|kun=みなみ-
|nanori=あけ, みな, よし
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: Used in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'' (759 {{CE}}) as {{m|ja|借音|tr=shakuon}} ''[[kana]]'' for {{IPAfont|⟨na⟩}} and {{m|ja|借訓|tr=shakkun}} ''[[kana]]'' for {{IPAfont|⟨namu⟩}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Minami}}
{{ja-kanjitab|みなみ|yomi=k}} {{IPAfont|⟨mi1nami1⟩}} → *{{IPAchar|/mʲinamʲɨ/}} → {{IPAchar|/minami/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=みなみ|-}}.

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|みんなみ}}

# {{lb|ja|historical|archaic}} the [[red-light district]] in modern-day {{w|Shinagawa}} [[ward|Ward]], [[Tokyo]]

subSections.title: Noun
